message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this fantastic product.  Given its unique value and features, I'm initially proposing a price of $22,000.  I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $18,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $18,000 is a tempting offer, I believe this product's true value is higher.  Would you be willing to meet me halfway at $20,000?
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still a bit lower on the price. Would you be willing to meet me at $17,500?
Bob, it seems like we're getting closer. I'm willing to come down a bit more, but I can't go as low as $17,500. How about we settle on $19,000? This is my final offer.
I appreciate your persistence, but I'm still a bit lower on the price. Would you be willing to meet me at $16,250?
